title: Bug 5120Empty popup doc in java editor
description: Bug 5120Empty popup doc in java editor 1.
OB: Move the ibeam over the beginning prefixes of an import statement.Forexample, the "org" of "import org.eclipse.swt.SWT".An empty hover help boxis displayed.
SR: Go to Java Perspective.2. Double click on a java file.3. Move the ibeam over the beginning prefixes of an import statement.Forexample, the "org" of "import org.eclipse.swt.SWT".An empty hover help boxis displayed.
